sourceMeaningMnemonic: You meet a <radical>woman</radical> whose <radical>mouth</radical> is <radical>big</radical> and you instantly know this is the person you want to <kanji>marry</kanji>.
meaningInfo: When you think about the person you want to marry, picture their mouth wide in a big, beautiful smile, a wide-open laugh. That's the lady for you, alright!
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>marry</kanji> this woman right away and you both go straight to an <reading>inn</reading> (<ja>いん</ja>) together!
readingInfo: When you get to the inn all you do is make her laugh and smile so you can bask in her bright, big, mouth smiles.
